Key Match Events: Thorsteinsson scored the only goal of the game in the 12th minute
England missed several good chances but couldn't equalize
Pre-Game Insights: England will face Serbia in their first game at Euro 2024 on June 16
Gareth Southgate emphasized the need for improvement in defense and composure with the ball
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate stated that the team needs to be better without the ball and showed more composure
Players like Declan Rice and Gordon expressed that the team needs to work on breaking down defensive teams and improving their overall performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first time since 1968 that England have lost their final match before a major international tournament
Iceland won at Wembley for the first time in their history
